alternateName: Accurate and up-to-date database of the world's cities and towns

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the World cities database dataset

distribution.name: worldcities.csv
distribution.description: A single CSV file, concise field names, only one entry per city. About 47 thousand unique cities and towns from every country in the world. Includes latitude and longitude coordinates. It was last refreshed on March 19, 2024.

field.name: city
field.description: The name of the city/town as a Unicode string (e.g. Goiânia).

field.name: city_ascii
field.description: city as an ASCII string (e.g. Goiania). Left blank if ASCII representation is not possible.

field.name: country
field.description: The name of the city/town's country.

field.name: iso2
field.description: The alpha-2 iso code of the country.

field.name: iso3
field.description: The alpha-3 iso code of the country.

field.name: admin_name
field.description: The name of the highest level administration region of the city town (e.g. a US state or Canadian province). Possibly blank.

field.name: capital
field.description:
Blank string if not a capital, otherwise:

- primary - country's capital (e.g. Washington D.C.)
- admin - first-level admin capital (e.g. Little Rock, AR)
- minor - lower-level admin capital (e.g. Fayetteville, AR)

field.name: population
field.description: An estimate of the city's urban population. Only available for some (prominent) cities.

field.name: id
field.description: A 10-digit unique id generated by SimpleMaps. We make every effort to keep it consistent across releases and databases (e.g. U.S. Cities Database).

recordSet.name: worldcities.csv
recordSet.description: A single CSV file, concise field names, only one entry per city. About 47 thousand unique cities and towns from every country in the world. Includes latitude and longitude coordinates. It was last refreshed on March 19, 2024.

keywords: subject > earth and nature > environment > cities and urban areas
subject > people and society > social science > demographics
name: World cities database
description:
The data is from:

https://simplemaps.com/data/world-cities

We're proud to offer a simple, accurate and up-to-date database of the world's cities and towns. We've built it from the ground up using authoritative sources such as the NGIA, US Geological Survey, US Census Bureau, and NASA.
   
Our database is:

- Up-to-date: It was last refreshed on March 19, 2024.
- Comprehensive: Over 4 million unique cities and towns from every country in the world (about 47 thousand in basic database).
- Accurate: Cleaned and aggregated from official sources. Includes latitude and longitude coordinates.
- Simple: A single CSV file, concise field names, only one entry per city.
